html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Compute elementary vector operations in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline].
Describe the geometry of vector operations.
Recognize vector spaces over the field [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R[/mathjaxinline].

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has 3 videos totaling 13 minutes, plus some questions.
